name: Terra Ball
description:
Terra Ball is a 3D tile based puzzle game made in Unity. The objective of each level is to get a ball from one portal to another. The player can change the tiles in the game in order to push, bounce, and teleport the ball. The game is inspired by past ball puzzle games like Marble Madness, Super Monkey Ball, and Switchball.

Terra Ball is currently a Work in Progress. If you're interested in giving feedback please check out the community forum on itch.io. Thanks in advanced for your support!
